# Frontend of Cooking

## Dev

Run develop version with

```shell
npm ci
npm run start
```

## Build

```shell
npm ci
npm run build
# build app will be found in ../fastapi/static
```

## Theme

Used colors

* https://material.io/resources/color/#!/?view.left=1&view.right=0&primary.color=2E7D32&secondary.color=90A4AE
* https://materialtheme.arcsine.dev/?

## Acknowledgements

* Chef icon made by https://www.flaticon.com/authors/nhor-phai Nhor Phai.
* Plate icon made by https://freesvg.org/vector-drawing-of-chicken-pattern-plate
